_header: A holy monk had great yearning / In his life to see tokening
_description: The Monk who wished to see the least Joy in Paradise, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
A holy monke had grett ȝernyngTo heyr in hys lyf som to
                    kynyng…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…þat god for hys mercy graunt vs graceTo com to þat
                    blessydfull place

BodAsh42.First Lines:
A hali monke had grete ȝernyngeIn his life to se takenynge
                    …
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þare euire es mirthe and ioliteAmen amen all saie
                    we
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
An holi Monk hedde gret longyngTo seo in his lyf sum
                    toknyng…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…God for his merci ȝiue vs graceTo gete sum part of heore
                    solace. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Of a monk desirede to seo þe leste blis of paradys (f.
                        190rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 277.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
A holi monke had grete longyngTo se in his life summe
                    tokenyng…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…God for his merci gif vs graceTo come to þat blissefull
                    place
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
narracio de monacho orante vt videret minimum gaudium paradisi (p.
                    196)

CULDd11.First Lines:
An holi monk had gret longingto seen in his lyf sum
                    toknyng…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& God of his merci ȝeue vs graceto gete sum merthe
                    of hire solace

CULGg531.First Lines:
A haly monk had grete ȝernyngTo se in hys lyf sum
                    takenyng…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…And bryng vs to þat ilk blysÞat he as ordand for
                    all hys

BLHar2391.First Lines: A holy monk had gret ȝeryngIn hys lyff to se takenyng…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …þer euer es myrth & IoliteAmen amen all say we
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica iii post pasche (left margin, f. 189v), with “A tale” written above

BLHar4196.First Lines: Ane haly monk had grete langingIn his life to se sum takining…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þan sal we beld with þam in blisþarto alweldand god vs wis
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.203-206.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Ane haly monke hade gret langyngTo se in hys lyfe some
                    takenyng…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…gode for hys mercy graunte vs þat graceTo come in to
                    þat blysefull place

HunHM129.First Lines:
A holy monk had grete langyngeTo se in his lyffe sum
                    tokenynge…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…God for his mercy gyff vs grasTo wyn sum parte of har
                    solas
